name: The Lily Foundation
briefDescription: Lily Foundation founded in August 2000 is a non-profit organization dedicated to providing beneficial programs to the people of India. Our focus on programs in Education and Humanitarian Services allows us to make a significant impact on the future of needy familes today and beyond. We have built this foundation on the basic principles of humanity, hope and honesty. At Lily Foundation, educating Indiaâ€™s less-advantaged population is our primary focus. It is through our various educational programs that we create opportunities for young students to not only matriculate but succeed in a relevant career path.
